name: @birbjs/devtools
description: Ease the pain of developing Birb.JS with this revolutionary package! Pay in 3 easy payments of $9.99!

scripts.publish-the-awesomeness: tsc && npm run files && node test.js && cd dist/ && npm publish --dry-run
scripts.publish-release: tsc && npm run files && cd dist/ && npm publish --access public
scripts.files: copyfiles package.json package-lock.json tsconfig.json .npmignore LICENSE README.md dist

author: knokbak
